name: Fastgen
headline: Webflow for the Backend
description: Fastgen is a low-code API and workflow builder with an integrated Postgres DB. Our drag-and-drop platform allows you to rapidly develop custom APIs and workflows with ease. Our integrated Postgres DB makes it even easier to create, read, update, and delete data in your applications.

founders.name: Mike Mahlkow, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO at Fastgen (W23). Previously CEO at Blair (S19) where we raised +100M to offer income-based financing options to students.  Before that learned how great teams operate at Stripe and Uber.

founders.name: David Nordhausen, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder at Fastgen (W23). Previously built Blair (S19). Reach out if you're interested in using us david@fastgen.com

founders.name: Constantin Schreiber, Founder
founders.description: Dropped out of college to build Blair (YC S19) where we raised a +100M to build income-based financing solutions for students in the US. At Blair, I led the engineering team to build audit-proof software that moved millions of dollars in student funds on a weekly basis. Two fun facts about me: I built autonomous drones for Porsche and was mining crypto to pay for college (and other things).

generated_description:
### Fastgen: The Webflow for Backends

Founded in 2023 and freshly hatched from Y Combinator’s W23 batch, Fastgen is revolutionizing backend development. Think of it as "Webflow for the Backend"—a low-code platform that makes creating APIs and workflows as easy as dragging and dropping. At its heart lies an integrated Postgres database that simplifies managing data—whether you're creating, reading, updating, or deleting.

### What Makes Fastgen Special?

Fastgen allows developers to rapidly build custom APIs and automate workflows without diving deep into complex code. It’s built for speed and efficiency, empowering teams to ship products faster than ever. With features that include:

- **API Creation:** Spin up REST endpoints with ease.
- **Debugging:** Integrated tools for real-time feedback on your API actions.
- **Cron Jobs:** Automate repetitive tasks without fuss.
- **Integrated Database:** Seamlessly manage data with a built-in Postgres DB.

The platform also supports custom code injections in Node.js and Python, allowing more technical users the flexibility they crave.

### The Team Behind the Magic

Located in New York, Fastgen boasts a lean team of seven passionate individuals, including founders Francesco Wiedemann and Trevor Blackwell. They have Gustaf Alstromer as their group partner, providing invaluable support and guidance as the company establishes itself in the developer tool landscape.

### Why Developers Are Taking Notice

Fastgen has been gaining traction, already nominated for a Product Hunt Golden Kitty Award. Users rave about the platform’s speed, its user-friendly interface, and how it alleviates the heavy lifting usually associated with backend development. The product is still in beta, but feedback suggests it has the potential to become a go-to solution for developers looking to streamline their workflow.

### Ready to Join?

Fastgen is all set to change how developers approach backend tasks. If you want to see the magic for yourself, check out their website at [Fastgen.com](https://fastgen.com). With Fastgen, building scalable backend systems feels like child’s play—because everyone deserves to be a builder, and Fastgen is here to make that happen.
